IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO PROVIDE QUALITY HOUSING AND SOCIAL SERVICES TO THE LOW AND MODERATE- INCOME FAMILIES OF THE SOUTH BRONX, NY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO PROVIDE QUALITY HOUSING AND SOCIAL SERVICES TO THE LOW AND MODERATE- INCOME FAMILIES OF THE SOUTH BRONX, NY.
IRS990.Desc: TO PROVIDE SAFE, CLEAN AND AFFORDABLE HOUSING TO LOW INCOME FAMILIES LOCATED IN THE SOUTH BRONX, NY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE D, PAGE 2, PART IV, LINE 2B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HOLDS SECURITY DEPOSITS FROM TENANTS IN AN ESCROW ACCOUNT. THESE DEPOSITS ARE RETURNED TO THE TENANTS ONCE THEY MOVE OUT OF THE APARTMENT.

THE ORGANIZATION IS MANAGED BY GRENADIER REALTY CORP AND BRUCKNER PROPERTY MANAGEMENT, WHICH MANAGES THE BOOKS AND RECORDS OF THE ORGANIZATION AS WELL AS THE DAY-TO-DAY OPERATIONS. AQUINAS HOUSING CORPORATION, ITS SPONSOR, OVERSEES OPERATIONS AND PROVIDES ASSET MANAGEMENT.

FAIRMONT PLACE HOUSING DEVELOPMENT FUND CORPORATION HAS ITS FORM 990 PREPARED BY AN OUTSIDE ACCOUNTING FIRM AND HAS ESTABLISHED THE FOLLOWING REVIEW PROCESS TO ENSURE THAT THE INFORMATION REPORTED IS COMPLETE AND ACCURATE. WHEN THE FORM 990 HAS BEEN PREPARED, REVIEWED BY THE CONTROLLER AND IS READY TO BE FILED WITH THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE, IT IS ELECTRONICALLY SENT TO THE BOARD MEMBERS OF THE ORGANIZATION FOR APPROVAL.

THE ORGANIZATION MAKES ITS FORM 990 AVAILABLE FOR PUBLIC INSPECTION AS REQUIRED UNDER SECTION 6104 OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE RETURN IS POSTED ON GUIDESTAR.ORG AND OTHER SIMILIAR TYPES OF WEBSITES. IN ADDITION, THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, ARTICLES OF INCORPORATION, FORM 990, FORM 1023, AND BY-LAWS ARE AVAILABLE UPON WRITTEN REQUEST OR BY CALLING THE ORGANIZATION DIRECTLY.

RelatedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HEART OF THE BRONX MANAGEMENT CORP
